009
010package imagingbook.common.regions.segment;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.NeighborhoodType2D;
014
015/**
016 * Binary region labeler based on a recursive flood filling
017 * algorithm. 
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 * @version 2020/12/21
021 */
022public class RecursiveSegmentation extends BinaryRegionSegmentation {
023
024        /**
025         * Constructor. Creates a new recursive binary region segmenter.
026         * 
027         * @param ip A binary input image with 0 values for background pixels and values &gt; 0
028         * for foreground pixels.
029         */
030        public RecursiveSegmentation(ByteProcessor ip) {
031                this(ip, DEFAULT_NEIGHBORHOOD);
032        }
033        
034        public RecursiveSegmentation(ByteProcessor ip, NeighborhoodType2D nh) {
035                super(ip, nh);
036        }
037        
038        @Override
039        protected boolean applySegmentation() {
040                try{
041                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
042                                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
043                                        if (getLabel(u, v) == FOREGROUND) {     // = unlabeled foreground
044                                                // start a new region
045                                                int label = getNextLabel();
046                                                floodFill(u, v, label);
047                                        }
048                                }
049                        }
050                } catch(StackOverflowError e) {
051                        return false;
052                }
053                return true;
054        }
055
056        private void floodFill(int x, int y, int label) {
057                if ((x >= 0) && (x < width) && (y >= 0) && (y < height) && getLabel(x, y) == FOREGROUND) {
058                        setLabel(x, y, label);
059                        floodFill(x + 1, y, label);
060                        floodFill(x, y + 1, label);
061                        floodFill(x, y - 1, label);
062                        floodFill(x - 1, y, label);
063                        if (NT == NeighborhoodType2D.N8) {
064                                floodFill(x + 1, y + 1, label);
065                                floodFill(x - 1, y + 1, label);
066                                floodFill(x + 1, y - 1, label);
067                                floodFill(x - 1, y - 1, label);
068                        }
069                }
070        }
071
072}
